items.description: The system produces a Definition of Done artifact from a free-form idea such that every item is concrete, non-vague, and schema-valid without manual editing.
items.verificationProcedure: Locate the recorded Definition of Done JSON artifact, validate it against DefinitionOfDoneSchema, and confirm all items pass validation with no manual modification.
notDoneConditions: Any DoD item contains vague language such as 'works', 'looks good', or 'should be fine'.
Manual editing is required to pass schema validation.
DoD items are descriptive without verifiable outcomes.

items.description: The system produces a Decision Lock artifact that fully specifies goals, non-goals, invariants, constraints, risks, and failure modes and references this DoD.
items.verificationProcedure: Locate the recorded Decision Lock JSON artifact, validate it against DecisionLockSchema, and confirm status is 'approved' with approvalMetadata present.
notDoneConditions: Any required Decision Lock section is empty.
Decision Lock references a missing or different DoD.

items.description: Execution is impossible unless evaluateExecutionGate() passes for the associated Definition of Done and Decision Lock.
notDoneConditions: Execution proceeds with a missing DoD.
Execution proceeds with an unapproved Decision Lock.
Execution can be forced via flags or configuration.

items.description: Execution produces a deterministic execution plan artifact enumerating all actions prior to execution.
items.verificationProcedure: Inspect the execution plan artifact and confirm all steps are explicitly enumerated and stable across repeated runs with identical inputs.
notDoneConditions: Execution plan differs between identical runs.
Steps are implied rather than explicitly listed.

items.description: A third party can reproduce verification results using only stored artifacts and repository state.
items.verificationProcedure: On a clean machine, clone the repository, load stored artifacts, re-run verification commands, and confirm identical results without additional context.
notDoneConditions: Verification depends on prior conversations or hidden state.
